code:
/**
 * Mini E-Commerce Store - Main Application Component
 * 
 * CLIENT-SIDE ROUTING EXPLANATION:
 * ====================================
 * This app uses React Router for client-side routing, which means:
 * 
 * 1. SAME URL STRUCTURE: The app works with identical URLs in both local
 *    development and production environments:
 *    - Local:     http://localhost:3000/cart
 *    - Production: https://yourdomain.com/cart
 * 
 * 2. NO PAGE RELOADS: React Router handles navigation client-side,
 *    providing a smooth, fast user experience without full page refreshes.
 * 
 * 3. SPA (SINGLE PAGE APPLICATION): The entire app loads once, and
 *    React dynamically updates the content based on the URL.
 * 
 * 4. ROUTE PERMISSIONS: All routes are accessible to all users:
 *    - Public routes: "/", "/cart", "/checkout-success"
 *    - No authentication required for any route
 * 
 * 5. LOCAL VS PRODUCTION:
 *    - Local:  Run with `npm start` → localhost:3000
 *    - Production: Run `npm run build` → deploy to any static host
 *    - Both use the SAME URL paths and routing logic
 * 
 * DEPLOYMENT REQUIREMENTS:
 * =========================
 * For the app to work correctly in production with client-side routing,
 * your server must be configured to:
 * 
 * - Serve index.html for ALL routes (not just the root)
 * - This allows React Router to handle the routing client-side
 * 
 * Example server configurations:
 * - Netlify: Create public/_redirects with "/* /index.html 200"
 * - Vercel: Automatic configuration (no setup needed)
 * - Apache: Use .htaccess with fallback to index.html
 * - Nginx: Configure try_files to serve index.html
 */import React from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import{StoreProvider}from'./context/StoreContext';import Navbar from'./components/Navbar';import Home from'./pages/Home';import Cart from'./components/Cart';import Checkout from'./components/Checkout';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StoreProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"main-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/cart",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cart,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/checkout-success",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Checkout,{})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\xA9 2026 MiniStore. All rights reserved."})})]})})});}export default App;

sourcesContent:
/** * Mini E-Commerce Store - Main Application Component * * CLIENT-SIDE ROUTING EXPLANATION: * ==================================== * This app uses React Router for client-side routing, which means: * * 1. SAME URL STRUCTURE: The app works with identical URLs in both local * development and production environments: * - Local: http://localhost:3000/cart * - Production: https://yourdomain.com/cart * * 2. NO PAGE RELOADS: React Router handles navigation client-side, * providing a smooth, fast user experience without full page refreshes. * * 3. SPA (SINGLE PAGE APPLICATION): The entire app loads once, and * React dynamically updates the content based on the URL. * * 4. ROUTE PERMISSIONS: All routes are accessible to all users: * - Public routes: "/", "/cart", "/checkout-success" * - No authentication required for any route * * 5. LOCAL VS PRODUCTION: * - Local: Run with `npm start` → localhost:3000 * - Production: Run `npm run build` → deploy to any static host * - Both use the SAME URL paths and routing logic * * DEPLOYMENT REQUIREMENTS: * ========================= * For the app to work correctly in production with client-side routing, * your server must be configured to: * * - Serve index.html for ALL routes (not just the root) * - This allows React Router to handle the routing client-side * * Example server configurations: * - Netlify: Create public/_redirects with "/* /index.html 200" * - Vercel: Automatic configuration (no setup needed) * - Apache: Use .htaccess with fallback to index.html * - Nginx: Configure try_files to serve index.html */ import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import { StoreProvider } from './context/StoreContext'; import Navbar from './components/Navbar'; import Home from './pages/Home'; import Cart from './components/Cart'; import Checkout from './components/Checkout'; function App() { return (
{/* Route Definitions - Same URLs work locally and in production */} } /> } /> } />

© 2026 MiniStore. All rights reserved.

 ); } export default App;
